properties.name: Contemporary Art Museum
properties.location:
F4X2+C56, Zona Cultural de Parque Central. Nivel Lecuna, Av. Bolívar
Caracas, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: The Contemporary Art Museum of Caracas, also known as Museo de Arte Contemporáneo de Caracas, is renowned for its extensive collection of modern and contemporary art. Established in 1973, the museum houses works by prominent artists such as Pablo Picasso, Joan Miró, and Fernando Botero. It is part of the Parque Central Complex, a major urban development in Caracas. The museum's architecture is notable for its modern design, providing a fitting backdrop for the diverse range of artworks it exhibits. Visitors can explore various galleries that showcase both Venezuelan and international artists, making it a key destination for art enthusiasts.

properties.name: Museum of Natural Sciences
properties.location:
Caracas 1014
Capital District
Venezuela
properties.description: The Museo de Ciencias de Caracas, inaugurated on July 24, 1940, is Venezuela's premier natural history museum. Designed by architect Carlos Raul Villanueva, the museum is located in the Plaza de los Museos in Caracas. It houses over 150,000 specimens, including taxidermied animals, fossils from the Taima Taima archaeological site in Falcon state, and a diverse collection of ethnographic pieces from Venezuela and Africa. Notable exhibits include the Dioramas of the Venezuelan Llanos, Venezuelan Rainforest, and African Fauna, which showcase the country's rich biodiversity. The museum also features interactive displays on topics like electromagnetism, paleontology, and the impact of pandemics. In 1993, it was declared a National Historic Monument. The museum is open to the public from Tuesday to Friday and on weekends and holidays, with free admission.

properties.name: Museum of Fine Arts
properties.location:
G423+66R, Plaza de los Museos, Bellas Artes, Av. Libertador
Caracas 1050, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: The Museo de Bellas Artes de Caracas, established in 1917, is the oldest and one of the most significant art museums in Venezuela. Located in the Plaza de los Museos, it houses a vast collection of over 5,600 works spanning from pre-Columbian art to contemporary pieces. The museum's architecture is notable, featuring a neoclassical building designed by Carlos Raúl Villanueva, complemented by a modern brutalist structure. Its diverse collections include art from ancient Egypt, China, and significant works by Venezuelan artists such as Arturo Michelena and Armando Reverón. The museum also hosts temporary exhibitions and cultural events, enriching the artistic landscape of Venezuela. (es.wikipedia.org)

properties.name: Asamblea Nacional
properties.location:
esquina de San Francisco a Monjas, Av. Universidad
Caracas 1012, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Asamblea Nacional, located at the corner of San Francisco and Monjas in Caracas, serves as the heart of Venezuela's legislative power. This historic building is known for its neoclassical architecture, featuring grand columns and detailed sculptures. Visitors to the site can appreciate its significant role in the country's political history and architecture. The surrounding area is often bustling with activity, reflecting the dynamic atmosphere of the capital city. While access may be restricted, the exterior remains a notable point of interest for those exploring Caracas.

properties.name: Restaurant El Chamo
properties.location:
F3V7+4M5
Caracas 1020, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Restaurant El Chamo is a family-friendly establishment in Caracas, known for its generous portions and affordable prices. The menu offers a variety of traditional Venezuelan dishes, including arepas, tequenos, and pabellon criollo. The atmosphere is clean and airy, providing a comfortable setting for casual dining. While the restaurant is not part of a large chain, it has received positive reviews for its quality food and welcoming environment.

properties.name: Redoma La India
properties.location:
Redoma de la India, Galerías El Paraiso, Av. Guzmán Blanco
Caracas 1020, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Redoma La India is a prominent roundabout located in the urban area of Caracas, Venezuela. This landmark features a striking statue of an indigenous woman, symbolizing the cultural heritage of the region. Surrounded by vibrant greenery, it serves as a major traffic hub and point of interest for both locals and tourists. The area around Redoma La India is characterized by commercial activity, making it a lively spot for shopping and dining. Its location at the intersection of several major avenues makes it a significant landmark within the city.

properties.name: Parque Zoológico El Pinar
properties.location:
F3J7+J37, Av. Guzmán Blanco
Caracas 1020, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Parque Zoológico El Pinar is a notable zoo located in Caracas, featuring a diverse collection of animal species from different parts of the world. The zoo aims to promote conservation and education through its exhibits, allowing visitors to learn about biodiversity and the importance of wildlife protection. It features lush gardens and walking paths, providing an inviting environment for family outings. The facility includes educational programs and activities tailored for children, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists interested in nature and wildlife.

properties.name: Salon Canton
properties.location:
F3P8+F7R, Calle Berrizbeitia
Caracas 1020, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Salon Canton is known for its freshly prepared Chinese food and friendly service. It's considered among the better Chinese restaurants in Caracas. Despite changes like the discontinuation of the customary bread rolls, the food maintains its quality, arriving fresh, tasty, and hot. It has garnered positive reviews, with one reviewer describing the experience as amazing. It is reasonably priced and provides a secure environment.

properties.name: Care Perro's House
properties.location:
Puente Hierro, Av. Buenos Aires
Caracas 1020, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Care Perro's House is a fast food restaurant situated in the Roca Tarpeya neighborhood of Caracas, Venezuela. Known for its quality and service, the establishment offers a variety of fast food options, including hamburgers and other quick bites. The restaurant operates with services such as delivery, drive-through, takeout, and dine-in, catering to a wide range of customer preferences. It has received positive reviews for its food quality and customer service, making it a popular choice among locals seeking quick and satisfying meals.

properties.name: Los Proceres Caracas
properties.location:
F4F3+56X, Avenida Los Próceres
Caracas 1090, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Los Proceres is a monumental avenue in Caracas, Venezuela, dedicated to the country's national heroes. It forms part of the Paseo Los Próceres, a ceremonial complex that includes statues, fountains, and expansive walkways. The site is used for military parades and national celebrations, reflecting its importance in Venezuelan history and culture. The avenue is lined with statues of key figures from Venezuela's independence movement, offering visitors a glimpse into the nation's past. The area is also a popular spot for locals and tourists to enjoy leisurely walks and take in the impressive architecture and landscaping.

properties.name: Parrillas Don Pepe
properties.location:
F4G4+V5H, C. Manuel Díaz Rodríguez
Caracas 1041, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Parrillas Don Pepe is a renowned eatery in Caracas, celebrated for its high-quality grilled meats and traditional Venezuelan flavors. Established over 30 years ago, it has become a local favorite, offering a variety of dishes such as parrilladas, hamburgers, and pepitos. The restaurant is known for its quick service and casual atmosphere, making it an ideal spot for a satisfying meal. Despite its modest size, Parrillas Don Pepe has maintained its reputation for delicious food and consistent quality over the years.

properties.name: La Esfera de Caracas
properties.location:
Autopista Francisco Fajardo
Caracas 1064 Venezuela
properties.description: La Esfera de Caracas, also known as the Caracas Sphere, is a prominent kinetic sculpture created by the renowned Venezuelan artist Jesús Rafael Soto. Installed in 1996, it is part of the artist's series of 'Penetrables' and is located along the Autopista Francisco Fajardo. The sculpture consists of a large sphere made up of hundreds of suspended metal rods, creating an optical illusion of movement as viewers change their perspective. This iconic piece of public art is a symbol of modern art in Venezuela and reflects Soto's exploration of space, perception, and movement.

properties.name: Plaza Venezuela
properties.location:
F4W7+RVF, Av. Casanova
Caracas 1052, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Plaza Venezuela is a prominent public square located in the Los Caobos neighborhood of Caracas, Venezuela. Inaugurated in 1940, it serves as a central hub in the city, featuring landmarks such as a fountain with nighttime illumination, the Monument to Christopher Columbus by Manuel de la Cova, the Fisicromia tribute to Andres Bello by Carlos Cruz-Diez, and the Abra Solar sculpture by Alejandro Otero. The plaza provides access to significant sites like the University City, the Botanical Garden of Caracas, the Twin Towers of Central Park, the Boulevard of Sabana Grande, and the Cultural Arts Center. Between 2007 and 2009, a restoration plan was carried out in the area by PDVSA La Estancia Art Center. The nearby Caracas Metro station, also named Plaza Venezuela, offers convenient transportation options.

properties.name: Arabito Casanova
properties.location:
Av. Casanova
Caracas 1050, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Arabito Casanova is a restaurant situated at Av. Casanova, Caracas 1050, Distrito Capital, Venezuela. It is part of the Arabito chain, which specializes in Middle Eastern and Lebanese cuisine. The restaurant offers a variety of traditional dishes, including shawarma, falafel, kibbe, and baklava. Additionally, Arabito Casanova features a store where customers can purchase Middle Eastern products such as tahini, sumac, curry, olive oil, and various spices. The establishment also provides a delivery service, allowing customers to enjoy their meals at home.

properties.name: William Phelps Ornithological Museum
properties.location:
Bello Monte Caracas 1060
Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: The William Phelps Ornithological Museum, situated in Caracas, is a significant center for the study and preservation of bird species in Venezuela. It hosts an extensive collection of specimens, including both taxidermy displays and educational exhibits focused on the importance of avian conservation. The museum aims to promote awareness about local and migratory birds, their habitats, and the ecological challenges they face. Visitors can explore various educational resources and attend events that highlight the rich biodiversity of Venezuela's avifauna.

properties.name: La Huerta Sabana Grande
properties.location:
F4VH+C25
Caracas 1050, Capital District
Venezuela
properties.description: La Huerta Sabana Grande is a Spanish tasca located in Caracas, offering a taste of Spain with its diverse menu. The restaurant is known for its authentic Spanish and Portuguese dishes, including specialties like 'fabada asturiana', 'cochinillo', and 'cordero encendido'. The establishment features a large square bar, a 'cabaña style' salon for larger gatherings, and a cozy wine cellar for a more intimate experience. Diners can enjoy a variety of seafood, meats, and traditional Spanish tapas, complemented by an extensive wine list. The venue is popular for its lively atmosphere, especially on weekends when patrons can watch Spanish football matches. Despite its location in a slightly run-down area, the restaurant remains a beloved spot for locals and visitors alike, offering valet parking for convenience.

properties.name: Rest. Urrutia
properties.location:
45 Calle Los Apamates
Caracas 1050, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Rest. Urrutia is a renowned Spanish restaurant situated in Caracas, Venezuela. It is celebrated for its authentic Spanish cuisine, particularly its high-quality seafood offerings. The restaurant has received positive reviews for its ambiance and culinary excellence, with patrons highlighting dishes like the Galician octopus and the 'Creme Catalana' dessert. The establishment is located at 45 Calle Los Apamates, Caracas 1050, Distrito Capital, Venezuela.

properties.name: Generalísimo Francisco de Miranda Park
properties.location:
F5V5+M6Q, Ruta de Campo
Caracas 1071, Miranda
Venezuela
properties.description: Generalísimo Francisco de Miranda Park, located in Caracas, is one of the city's largest and most popular green spaces. This urban park offers a variety of attractions, including walking paths, recreational areas, and lush gardens, making it a favored spot for both locals and tourists. The park features several facilities for sports and leisure activities, along with playgrounds for children. Visitors can enjoy scenic views, shaded benches, and open spaces to relax, exercise, or have picnics amidst nature. Events and cultural activities often take place here, making it a vibrant hub of community life.

properties.name: Nola Gourmet Bakery
properties.location:
Avenida Francisco de Miranda
Caracas 1071, Miranda
Venezuela
properties.description: Nola Gourmet Bakery is a multifaceted establishment located in Caracas, Venezuela, offering a variety of services including a bakery, restaurant, and market. The user-provided address, Avenida Francisco de Miranda, Caracas 1071, matches the location of Nola Gourmet Bakery.

properties.name: Carbón Restaurant
properties.location:
Av Eugenio Mendoza, Trans. 1
Caracas 1060, Distrito Capital
Venezuela
properties.description: Carbón Restaurant, situated in the La Castellana neighborhood of Caracas, offers a fusion of classic Venezuelan cuisine with a focus on charcoal-grilled specialties. The menu features dishes such as arepitas de chicharrón, tequeños, empanaditas, buñuelos de yuca, and chicharrón criollo, which can be combined in a sampler. Main courses include pollo a la brasa, punta angus, solomo, lomito, costilla barbecue, and parrilla carbón with chorizo, morcilla, and chistorra. Accompaniments like hallaquitas, tostones, cachapa de hoja, cangrí, papas fritas, yuca frita, and tajadas are also available. The restaurant provides both dine-in and delivery services, with a modern and spacious ambiance designed by Atelier Caracas. Valet parking is available for guests.
